metadata.description: Curated collection of Claude Code plugins: LSP tools for 28 programming languages with automated hooks for linting, formatting, security, and code quality

plugins.name: bash-lsp
plugins.description: Bash/Shell development with bash-language-server LSP and ShellCheck hooks

plugins.name: cpp-lsp
plugins.description: C/C++ development with clangd LSP, clang-tidy, and clang-format hooks

plugins.name: csharp-lsp
plugins.description: C# development with OmniSharp LSP and dotnet format hooks

plugins.name: dockerfile-lsp
plugins.description: Dockerfile development with dockerfile-language-server LSP and hadolint hooks

plugins.name: elixir-lsp
plugins.description: Elixir development with ElixirLS LSP and mix format hooks

plugins.name: go-lsp
plugins.description: Go development with gopls LSP, gofmt, golangci-lint, and go vet hooks

plugins.name: graphql-lsp
plugins.description: GraphQL development with graphql-language-service LSP and schema validation hooks

plugins.name: haskell-lsp
plugins.description: Haskell development with haskell-language-server LSP, hlint, and ormolu hooks

plugins.name: html-css-lsp
plugins.description: HTML/CSS development with vscode-html-languageserver and stylelint hooks

plugins.name: java-lsp
plugins.description: Java development with Eclipse JDT LSP, checkstyle, and google-java-format hooks

plugins.name: json-lsp
plugins.description: JSON development with vscode-json-languageserver and schema validation hooks

plugins.name: kotlin-lsp
plugins.description: Kotlin development with kotlin-language-server LSP and ktlint hooks

plugins.name: latex-lsp
plugins.description: LaTeX development with texlab LSP and chktex hooks

plugins.name: lua-lsp
plugins.description: Lua development with lua-language-server LSP and luacheck hooks

plugins.name: markdown-lsp
plugins.description: Markdown development with marksman LSP and markdownlint hooks

plugins.name: php-lsp
plugins.description: PHP development with intelephense LSP, php-cs-fixer, and phpstan hooks

plugins.name: python-lsp
plugins.description: Python development with pylsp/pyright LSP, ruff, black, and mypy hooks

plugins.name: ruby-lsp
plugins.description: Ruby development with solargraph LSP and rubocop hooks

plugins.name: rust-lsp
plugins.description: Rust development with rust-analyzer LSP, clippy, rustfmt, and cargo-audit hooks

plugins.name: scala-lsp
plugins.description: Scala development with Metals LSP and scalafmt hooks

plugins.name: sql-lsp
plugins.description: SQL development with sql-language-server LSP and sqlfluff hooks

plugins.name: svelte-lsp
plugins.description: Svelte development with svelte-language-server LSP and eslint-plugin-svelte hooks

plugins.name: swift-lsp
plugins.description: Swift development with sourcekit-lsp and swiftformat hooks

plugins.name: terraform-lsp
plugins.description: Terraform/Terragrunt development with terraform-ls LSP, tflint, trivy, and checkov hooks

plugins.name: typescript-lsp
plugins.description: TypeScript/JavaScript development with vtsls LSP, eslint, and prettier hooks

plugins.name: vue-lsp
plugins.description: Vue.js development with Volar LSP, eslint-plugin-vue, and prettier hooks

plugins.name: yaml-lsp
plugins.description: YAML development with yaml-language-server LSP and yamllint hooks

plugins.name: zig-lsp
plugins.description: Zig development with zls LSP and zig fmt hooks
